When design meets code

Designing was always my thing, I enjoy having creative ideas and being able to convert those ideas into a real world object makes me puke rainbows. I fell inlove with coding since the day I did my first "Hello, world.", Coding is an art just like creative designing, so why not combine them together?.

Why me?

Graduate of B.S. Information Technology, knowledgable and experienced in using modern front end web technologies and creative suite (Illustrator and Photoshop), passionate in combining the art of coding and the art of creative designing and use it to develop a clean with SEO friendly design and code websites, and will pursue to extend my knowledge in different technologies used in this field.
